Pre-Game Insights: This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
Seth Lugo will start for the Royals with a 3.03 ERA in 32 starts this year.
Reynaldo Lopez will start for the Braves with an 8-5 record and a 2.03 ERA in 24 starts.
Thirteen of the Braves' last 14 home games against AL Central opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Each of the Royals' last four night games against National League opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Braves' last four home games.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Royals' last three night games.
